org.jfree.chart.event.PlotChangeListener

      Classes in org.jfree.chart.plot that implement PlotChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CombinedDomainCategoryPlot
      A combined category plot where the domain axis is shared.
      class  CombinedDomainXYPlot
      An extension of XYPlot that contains multiple subplots that share a common domain axis.

      A combined category plot where the range axis is shared.
      class  CombinedRangeXYPlot
      An extension of XYPlot that contains multiple subplots that share a common range axis.
      class  MultiplePiePlotTest
      Some tests for the MultiplePiePlot class.
      class  MyPlotChangeListener
      A utility class for testing plot events.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Plot.addChangeListener(PlotChangeListener listener)
      Registers an object for notification of changes to the plot.
      void Plot.removeChangeListener(PlotChangeListener listener)
      Unregisters an object for notification of changes to the plot.
